query: SELECT ?featureALabel (geof:distance(?wktA, ?wktB) AS ?distance) WHERE { <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/resource/Byways> geo:hasGeometry/geo:asWKT ?wktB . ?featureA a <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/ontology#SignalingStake> ; rdfs:label ?featureALabel ; geo:hasGeometry/geo:asWKT ?wktA . } ORDER BY DESC(?distance) LIMIT 1
natural_language_question: What is the furthest Signaling Stake to Byways?

query: SELECT ?featureALabel (geof:distance(?wktA, ?wktB) AS ?distance) WHERE { <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/resource/Kilkerinn_Ruins> geo:hasGeometry/geo:asWKT ?wktB . ?featureA a <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/ontology#GwentPlayer> ; rdfs:label ?featureALabel ; geo:hasGeometry/geo:asWKT ?wktA . } ORDER BY ASC(?distance) LIMIT 1
natural_language_question: What is the closest Gwent Player to Kilkerinn Ruins?

query: SELECT (IF(?countA > ?countB, "Yes", "No") AS ?result) WHERE { { SELECT (COUNT(?featureA) as ?countA) WHERE { <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/resource/Velen_Novigrad_Map> geo:hasGeometry/geo:asWKT ?polyA . ?featureA a <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/ontology#MonsterQuest> ; geo:hasGeometry/geo:asWKT ?pointA . FILTER(geof:sfWithin(?pointA, ?polyA)) } } { SELECT (COUNT(?featureB) as ?countB) WHERE { <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/resource/Lurtch> geo:hasGeometry/geo:asWKT ?polyB . ?featureB a <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/ontology#MonsterQuest> ; geo:hasGeometry/geo:asWKT ?pointB . FILTER(geof:sfWithin(?pointB, ?polyB)) } } }
natural_language_question: Does Velen/Novigrad Map have more Monster Quest than Lurtch?

query: SELECT ?objectLabel WHERE { <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/resource/Liesje> <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/ontology#hair_color> ?object . OPTIONAL { ?object rdfs:label ?objLabel . } BIND(IF(isURI(?object), ?objLabel, ?object) AS ?objectLabel) }
natural_language_question: What is the hair color of Liesje?

query: SELECT (COUNT(?feature) as ?count) WHERE { <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/resource/Crow_s_Perch> geo:hasGeometry/geo:asWKT ?polygonWKT . ?feature a <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/ontology#Crafting_Station> ; geo:hasGeometry/geo:asWKT ?pointWKT . FILTER(geof:sfWithin(?pointWKT, ?polygonWKT)) }

query: SELECT DISTINCT ?locationLabel WHERE { <http://cgi.di.uoa.gr/witcher/resource/Reardon_Manor> rdfs:label ?locationLabel ; geo:hasGeometry/geo:asWKT ?polygonWKT .
